## Description

Fluent Commerce is an order management system that allows you to track customers, orders and inventory.

Fluent Commerce offers a [GraphQL-based](https://graphql.org/) API.
This gives you flexibility and control over what data you send to Fluent, and what data you request back.

While this component offers some actions that wrap common GraphQL queries and mutations, there are many more queries and mutations for which there aren't dedicated actions.
If you'd like to run a query or mutation that is not represented by an action, please use the [Generic Request](#genericrequest) action.

## Connections

### Fluent Commerce OAuth 2.0 Password Grant

Fluent uses OAuth 2.0 password grant type for authentication.
To authenticate with Fluent, you will need a **Client ID** and **Client Secret** from Fluent, and your end users will need to enter their username and password.

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "A client ID obtained from Fluent support",
      key: "clientId",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "OAuth 2.0 Client ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "A client secret obtained from Fluent support",
      key: "clientSecret",
      type: "password",
      default: "",
      label: "OAuth 2.0 Client Secret",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      placeholder: "https://REPLACE-ME.api.fluentretail.com",
      example: "https://REPLACE-ME.api.fluentretail.com",
      comments: "The retailer's Fluent API endpoint",
      key: "host",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Fluent Host",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "The retailer's password",
      key: "password",
      type: "password",
      default: "",
      label: "Retailer Password",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "The retailer's username",
      example: "john_doe",
      key: "username",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Retailer Username",
    },
  ]}
/>

### Create Customer

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: false,

      required: true,

<div id="createproduct" />

### Create Product

Create a new standard product | <small><b>key: createProduct</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "An OAuth 2.0 password grant type connection",
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "012345678905",
      comments: "The global trade number of the product",
      key: "gtin",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Global Trade Item Number (GTIN)",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "USD",
      comments: "Type of currency the price is in (USD, YEN, GBP, etc)",
      key: "priceCurrency",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Price Currency",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "1300",
      comments: "The price of the product (must be a floating-point number)",
      key: "priceValue",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Price Value",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "FCRG:PC:MASTER",
      comments: "The reference ID (ref) of an existing product catalog",
      key: "productCatalogueRef",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Product Catalogue Ref (ID)",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "Widget",
      comments: "The name of the product (not required to be unique)",
      key: "productName",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Product Name",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "TESTPRD",
      comments: "The reference ID (ref) of the new product (must be unique)",
      key: "productRef",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Product Ref ID",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "Widgets: the new whatsits",
      key: "productSummary",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      label: "Product Summary / Description",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      example: "STANDARD",
      comments: "The type of the product",
      key: "productType",
      type: "string",
      default: "STANDARD",
      label: "Product Type",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "createStandardProduct": {
      "id": "03440122-ea39-499b-83aa-f08b2614daf3",
      "ref": "TESTPRD3"
    }
  }
}
```

<div id="genericrequest" />

### Generic GraphQL Request

Issue any GraphQL query or mutation with variables | <small><b>key: genericRequest</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "An OAuth 2.0 password grant type connection",
      key: "connection",
      type: "connection",
      label: "Connection",
    },
    {
      required: true,
      language: "graphql",
      key: "query",
      type: "code",
      default: "{\n  me {\n    id\n    username\n    primaryEmail\n  }\n}",
      label: "Query or Mutation",
    },
    {
      required: false,
      key: "variables",
      type: "string",
      default: "",
      collection: "keyvaluelist",
      label: "Variables",
    },
    {
      language: "json",
      required: false,
      key: "variablesObject",
      type: "code",
      default: "",
      label: "Variables Object",
    },
  ]}
/>
